price: A na Dan kad se u rog puhne, pa se smrtno istrave i oni na nebesima i oni na Zemlji, izuzev onih koje Allah poštedi, svi će Mu ponizno doći.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوۡهُ دَٰخِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fafaziʿa man fī al-samāwāti waman fī al-arḍi illā man shāa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dākhirīna
